title: Is transfer to China possible?
body: Later this year I'll be moving to China to teach English. Normally I'd just make a new account to play there (as I know they require a Chinese phone number to make accounts etc so this will be tricky) but I have several hundred dollars worth of skins on this account. I was wondering if, when I do move, there is a way to transfer from OCE to CN?

replies.body:
There should be transfers available, but I'm not 100% sure on it actually working.

Make sure that you get the RP in order to transfer **before** you leave.
